about_the_game:
In this MMO Idle strategy game, you will create a leading civilization of penguins by choosing a comfortable development style for yourself:

  • Military craft or dangerous dungeon adventures

  • Farming, fishing, and hunting

  • Mining and smithing development

  • Trading with other players for profit

Help the penguins, who have fled from the plague and the undead, build a new home on the island of Nortopia. Take on the role of leader and turn this island into an impregnable fortress, capable of protecting your family from any threat. Explore the island's rich resources, build and develop your settlement, establish trade relations with other islands, and engage in diplomatic negotiations with other families.

Send brave penguins into dangerous dungeons, where unknown dangers and untold treasures await them. Dive into sea adventures, hunt for treasures, and fight pirates. Create clans and participate in epic battles for power to establish your dominance over the archipelago.

Nortopia is your chance to start fresh, build a powerful empire, and protect your loved ones in this thrilling world full of dangers and opportunities. Can you rise to the challenge and lead your family to prosperity?

In the demo version, you will be able to build your first structures, prepare the island for future penguin life, and venture into mines to extract rare ores and minerals.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3 (Arch-based)
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t, 2,4–3,5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.6GHz
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3 (Arch-based)
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t, 2.4-3.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.6GHz
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
